name: 王紳
objective: 本課程在訓練學生對無線通訊積體電路與無線收發系統有充分的了解。課程內容包含： 1.簡介 2.RLC/傳輸線/2port網路 3.調變/解調 4.收發機架構 5.Case Study
schedule:
1.Introduction
2.IC Fabrication
3.RLC Network
4.Passive IC Components
5.Case Study (I)
6.Transmission Line
7.2-port Network
8.Case Study (II)
9.Midterm Exam
10.Modulation & Demodulation
11.Modulation & Demodulation
12.Modulation & Demodulation
13.Case Study (III)
14.Transceiver Architecture
15.Transceiver Architecture
16.Transceiver Architecture
17.Final Report
18.Final Exam
